summary: Project to edit, format, and publish (upload) a day-wise Programme Overview (3-day event schedule) to the user's homepage/production site.

existing_features.title: Update the homepage Programme Overview section (frontend/src/components/sections/ProgrammeSection.tsx) so it matches the provided cleaned, day-wise Programme Overview content in clear English (DAY 1–DAY 3, May 1–3, 2026), including each day’s date label, weekday label, theme/title, and the correct time-slot-to-activity pairings.

new_feature_requests.summary: Upload/publish the cleaned day-wise Programme Overview content to the site/homepage
Publish (upload) the updated Programme Overview to the live homepage so the new schedule is visible in production.

projectName: Publish updated Programme Overview to homepage
